## Classes

### <a name="ccs_monit"></a>`ccs_monit`

Install and configure monit.

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `ccs_monit` class:

* [`mailhost`](#-ccs_monit--mailhost)
* [`alert`](#-ccs_monit--alert)
* [`uptime`](#-ccs_monit--uptime)
* [`gpfs`](#-ccs_monit--gpfs)
* [`hosts`](#-ccs_monit--hosts)
* [`temp`](#-ccs_monit--temp)
* [`network`](#-ccs_monit--network)
* [`disks`](#-ccs_monit--disks)

##### <a name="-ccs_monit--mailhost"></a>`mailhost`

Data type: `Variant[String,Array[String]]`

String specifying smtp server; or an array of strings.

Default value: `'localhost'`

##### <a name="-ccs_monit--alert"></a>`alert`

Data type: `Variant[String,Array[String]]`

String giving email address to receive alerts; or an array of strings.

Default value: `'root@localhost'`

##### <a name="-ccs_monit--uptime"></a>`uptime`

Data type: `Boolean`

Monitor uptime

Default value: `true`

##### <a name="-ccs_monit--gpfs"></a>`gpfs`

Data type: `Boolean`

Monitor gpfs

Default value: `false`

##### <a name="-ccs_monit--hosts"></a>`hosts`

Data type: `Array[String]`

Monitor hosts

Default value: `[]`

##### <a name="-ccs_monit--temp"></a>`temp`

Data type: `Boolean`

Monitor temp

Default value: `false`

##### <a name="-ccs_monit--network"></a>`network`

Data type: `Boolean`

Monitor networks

Default value: `true`

##### <a name="-ccs_monit--disks"></a>`disks`

Data type: `Hash`

Hash of hashes overriding parameters for monitored disks. Of the form:
'/path' => { space => 99, ... }

Default value: `{}`
